document_data.name: Minghee Graywind
document_data.mainbody: '''Minghee Graywind''' was a [[human]] who worked at the [[Lionshield Coster (Phandalin)|Lionshield Coster]] trading post in [[Phandalin]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. She was the daughter of the store's owner, [[Linene Graywind]].
document_data.Personality:
Minghee was an outgoing, excitable, and restless young woman who dreamt of traveling and of learning to use [[magic]]. Above all, she wished to make a name for herself and to see the world before she settled down.

She had a knack for business and was good with [[mathematics|math]].
document_data.Activities: Although she worked at the Lionshield Coster for her mother, Minghee did not want to. She was quick to share that she wanted to do something different with her life.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1496}},{{AI-time}} Minghee worked at her mother's store reluctantly, and was acutely aware that her mother expected her to take over the family business within a few years. Hoping to travel and to find something more exciting to do with her life, Minghee was quick to seek out other opportunities that would afford her the chance to leave Phandalin.
